description.description: A short description of this Team.
description.title: Description

icon.description: fileHandleId for icon image of the Team

isOpen.description: true for teams which members can join without an invitation or approval

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time a Team is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of a Team is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this Team was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

modifiedOn.description: The date this Team was last modified.
modifiedOn.title: Modified On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this Team.
createdBy.title: Created By

modifiedBy.description: The ID of the user that last modified this Team.
modifiedBy.title: Modified By
